logger

Class TimeAccumulator<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • logger.TimeAccumulator<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Tool type

    public class TimeAccumulator<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to accumulate time the user has spent using various tools.
